name: Compare Owner Holiday Rentals (COHR)
overview:
COHR provides advice for vacations rentals / holiday rentals owners. Recent years have seen a dramatic increase in the number of vacation rentals by owner.

Compare Owner Holiday Rentals (COHR) helps owners of vacation rentals accommodation make the right choices for advertising their vacation rental properties on the internet. With so many portals, directories and listing sites for holiday rental owners to choose from, it can be confusing to determine where to advertising your property. Compare Owner Holiday Rentals provides comparisons and reviews of holiday rentals sites In addition, we solicit comments from both holiday rentals owners and holiday accommodation renters on their experience using a particular owner holidays rentals website.
